name: Need My Space
description:
Everyone has their own bubble of personal space that they are comfortable in and do not like other people to invade.

You have to simply help your extremely introvert player avoid social interactions or else his anxiety levels will increase. Any object that help him do so, i.e. books, phone or headphones help him reduce his anxiety and gain points. Colliding or interacting with any other person makes him more anxious and reduces his bubble of
personal space.

You have to save your player’s bubble of personal space from bursting or they’ll isolate themselves completely and you’ll lose the game.

The app uses phone's sensors to move around and interact with the world
